mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE LINK(ID, PARENT_ID) AS ( SELECT t1.ID, t1.PARENT_ID FROM VTL_DEPT t1 WHERE t1.PARENT_ID = #{id} AND t1.DISABLED = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT t2.ID, t2.PARENT_ID FROM LINK link INNER JOIN VTL_DEPT t2 ON link.ID = t2.PARENT_ID ) SELECT DISTINCT ID FROM LINK ORDER BY ID
SELECT DISTINCT t.ID FROM VTL_DEPT t WHERE t.DISABLED = 'N' START WITH t.PARENT_ID = #{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.ID = t.PARENT_ID
